name: I MUST CONSUME
description:
This is a game for /agdg/ Asset Jam - Part 2.

You play as a ball. You want to get bigger. Run into things to eat them, providing they're smaller or the same size. Become the biggest ball. CONSUME!

Controls: KeyboardControllerMovementWASDLeft StickCameraMouseRight StickJumpSpaceX  (PS) / A (Xbox) / B (Switch)ResetRTriangle (PS) / Y (Xbox) / X (Switch)

Don't take this game too seriously. I didn't.
